lead_paragraph: Darnell Dodson, a 6-foot-6 guard who was a member of what Pittsburgh Coach Jamie Dixon called his best recruiting class, is planning to transfer to Miami Dade College.Dodson had been allowed to practice with the Panthers as he awaited word on his eligibility for this season, but he stopped practicing this week. When he learned he was not eligible, Dodson decided to transfer.Dodson, a strong outside shooter, had been expected to redshirt this season.
